parameter.name: queueUrl
parameter.description: The URL of the queue to which a message is sent

parameter.name: awsAccountNumbers
parameter.description: The AWS account number of the principal who will be given permission. The account ids should be separated by ','. Eg: 111111111234, 111111111111

parameter.name: actionNames
parameter.description: The actions the client wants to allow for the specified principal. The actions should be separated by ','. Eg: SendMessage, DeleteMessage

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: The unique identification of the permission you're setting

parameter.name: apiCallTimeout
parameter.description: The amount of time(In Seconds) to allow the client to complete the execution of an API call

parameter.name: apiCallAttemptTimeout
parameter.description: The amount of time(In Seconds) to wait for the http request to complete before giving up and timing out

parameter.name: queueId
parameter.description: The unique identifier of the queue
